about_the_game:
"Das Geheimnis von Lakeshore" is a classic 2D point and click adventure game with retro pixel graphics.

It's about a small village, quite isolated between mountains and forests. Several murders take place there and the young reporter Tim is dragged into it and tries to solve the mystery. Not knowing what he has gotten himself into...

You play the role of Tim and try to solve the murder on your own, encountering strange characters in an even stranger village. Interact with people or objects in the game to have conversations or solve puzzles and get to the bottom of the mystery.

You can expect a fun and exciting adventure game, inspired by the old point and click adventures of the ´80s & '90s.
